text: Battling Bunyan is a 1924 American silent sports comedy film directed by Paul Hurst and starring Wesley Barry, Frank Campeau and Molly Malone.Lussier p.97 In order to raise cash in a hurry, a young man takes up professional boxing despite the fact he is totally unsuited to it. ==Cast== * Wesley Barry as Battling Bunyan * Frank Campeau as Jim Canby * Molly Malone as Molly Costigan * Landers Stevens as Pierson * Al Kaufman as Referee * John Ralesco as Johnny Prentiss * Jackie Fields as Sailor Levinsky * Chester Conklin as A Stranger * Pat Kemp as Rudy * Harry Mann as Prizefighter Manager ==References== ==Bibliography== * Tim Lussier. "Bare Knees" Flapper: The Life and Films of Virginia Lee Corbin. McFarland, 2018. ==External links== * Category:1924 films Category:American films Category:American sports comedy films Category:Films directed by Paul Hurst Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Pathé Exchange films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1920s sports comedy films Category:American boxing films Category:1924 comedy films
title: Battling Bunyan
